name: Seema aka S.MA
greetingText: I really like this name btw!
textInChatBox: Happiest Happiest birthday to you!! Yeeeeee! Many many happy happy . . . .. bas itna hi happy hona hai nhi to jyada ho jaega 😁 .....
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it. to messege karna ye nhi ki dekh ke bas rakh di 😒
replayText: Or click, age ye fir se dekhna hai to ......mtlb accha lga hi hoga....😁😁
